Package cs3500.easyanimator.model.shapes

Interface IShape

All Known Implementing Classes:
AShape, Oval, Rectangle, Triangle
public interface IShape
To represent a two-dimensional shape. All IShapes are expected to have a Color, Dimension, and Posn.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void changeColorByTick​(int r, int g, int b, int ticks)
    Given the desired final r, g, and b color values of the shape and the number of ticks in which that final color is to be achieved.
    void changeDimensionByTick​(int w, int h, int ticks)
    Given the desired final w and h dimensions of the shape and the number of ticks in which that final dimension is to be achieved.
    void changePositionByTick​(int x, int y, int ticks)
    Given the desired final x and y position of the shape and the number of ticks in which that final position is to be achieved.
    void changeVisibility​(boolean b)
    Changes the visibility of the shape.
    Color getColor()
    Gets the shape's color as a Color.
    Dimension getDimension()
    Gets the dimension of the shape as a Dimension.
    Posn getPosn()
    Gets the shape's position as a Posn.
    boolean getVisibility()
    Return's the shape's visibility.
    java.lang.String officialShapeName()
    The official name of the shape that the class represents.
    java.lang.String toString()
    Returns a textual log of the shape's properties.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a textual log of the shape's properties. Properties are returned as integers, separated by a space, in the following order: x-position, y-position, width, height, red, green, blue.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      the string log of the shape's properties

    • officialShapeName

      java.lang.String officialShapeName()
      The official name of the shape that the class represents.
      Returns:
      the name of the shape

    • changePositionByTick

      void changePositionByTick​(int x, int y, int ticks)
      Given the desired final x and y position of the shape and the number of ticks in which that final position is to be achieved. Utilizes rate of change to alter the shape's position by the amount it should over a single tick. This method should be called by the given number of ticks to achieve the desired final position.
      Parameters:
      x - the shape's new x position
      y - the shape's new y position
      ticks - the total amount of ticks the action should take

    • changeDimensionByTick

      void changeDimensionByTick​(int w, int h, int ticks)
      Given the desired final w and h dimensions of the shape and the number of ticks in which that final dimension is to be achieved. Utilizes rate of change to alter the shape's dimension by the amount it should over a single tick. This method should be called by the given number of ticks to achieve the desired final dimension.
      Parameters:
      w - the shape's new width
      h - the shape's new height
      ticks - the total amount of ticks the action should take

    • changeColorByTick

      void changeColorByTick​(int r, int g, int b, int ticks)
      Given the desired final r, g, and b color values of the shape and the number of ticks in which that final color is to be achieved. Utilizes rate of change to alter the shape's color by the amount it should over a single tick. This method should be called by the given number of ticks to achieve the desired final color.
      Parameters:
      r - the shape's new red value
      g - the shape's new green value
      b - the shape's new blue value
      ticks - the total amount of ticks the action should take

    • changeVisibility

      void changeVisibility​(boolean b)
      Changes the visibility of the shape. True represents visible and false represents invisible. Leaving open for implementation until the view is connected.
      Parameters:
      b - the new visibility of the shape

    • getDimension

      Dimension getDimension()
      Gets the dimension of the shape as a Dimension.
      Returns:
      the shape's dimension

    • getColor

      Color getColor()
      Gets the shape's color as a Color.
      Returns:
      the shape's color

    • getPosn

      Posn getPosn()
      Gets the shape's position as a Posn.
      Returns:
      the shape's position

    • getVisibility

      boolean getVisibility()
      Return's the shape's visibility. True means that the shape is visible and false means that the shape is not visible.
      Returns:
      the visibility of the shape
